channel.title: Mello (Neutral killing ) Joke class
channel.description:
Mello-(Neutral killing)
Passives
WHY THE HELL CAN'T I MAKE IT FIRST- Be fueled by your rage of rivalry NOW GO OUT THERE AND GET SOME MAFIA PEOPLE TO HELP YOU OR ANY EVIL PERSON
Matt is my best friend....-HAVE SOMEONE TO BLOC ZE OBSERVERS AND NIGHTWATCH NO ONE CAN SEE YOU OTHER THEN YOUR BEST FRIEND WHO WILL TELL YOU OF ANY DANGERS
Day abilities
Eat!-Take your chocolate bar and eat!
Night abilities
LISTEN TO ME!-Bring a gun near to someones face and threaten them or you will shoot but they won't and you kill them
Kidnap-Take someone on your motorcycle to somewhere and then hope they don't have the death note to kill you.
Goal:**Takes a bar of chocolate and eats it** I will surpass Near and show him who catches Kira!
Note:Please post the best of comments :wink:

item.title: Mello (Neutral killing ) Joke class

item.description:
BUT YOUR DEAD WITH ME.Ahahaha there is my trap card.
